name: TRENCH
description: The trench coat possesses the all-military demeanor of a uniform. Designed for British army officers, the symbolism of this utilitarian garment has all to do with in-field realities: a collar and waterproof canvas fabric shield from the rain while a double-breasted crossed closure and buckled belt ensure total freedom of movement. An apparel of absolute masculinity that has become a classic of the men's wardrobe.
